properties.title: Can Hiccup Supply Enough Fish to Maintain a Dragon’s Diet?

properties.details: The paper investigates the feasibility of Hiccup, a teenage boy, being able to supply enough fish to maintain Toothless the dragon's diet. It was found that in the twelve days that Toothless was trapped, he would have required 13 Icelandic cod and 56 Atlantic salmon every day, totaling 716 kg. Hiccup would have had to carry 828 fish weighing a total of 8592 kg over the twelve days, which is unrealistic since he struggles to lift a shield in combat.
The volume in m^3 of the fish bag calculated in the paper is not provided in the new information.
The volume in m^3 of the fish bag calculated in the paper is not mentioned in the provided content.
